title: Zooey Deschanel, Property Bros Jonathan Scott Kiss at DWTS
text:
Photo: Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images

Don’t worry. If you thought you saw Zooey Deschanel and Property Brothers star Jonathan Scott kissing in the front row of Monday night’s episode of Dancing With the Stars, it was not just an erotic hallucination brought on by your hyperventilation over Sean Spicer’s Saturday Night Fever dance homage to John Travolta. Your brain might be losing oxygen because of Spicer’s cha-cha too, but according to People, Deschanel and Scott also really share a televised kiss when they were visible on-screen.

The pair, who reportedly met on the set of James Corden’s Car Pool Karaoke, went public with their new relationship earlier in September, and now they seem to be trying to take it even more public. (It’s not like they kissed in the back row at Dancing With the Stars, you know what we’re saying?) What better way to demonstrate your affection than to literally broadcast it to the entire nation, we say? And really, who could stop themselves? Human nature just tends to take its course whenever Tom Bergeron’s in the room.
description: New couple Zooey Deschanel and Property Brothers Jonathan Scott kiss in the front row of Monday’s episode of Dancing With the Stars.
